headline: 1 Top Dow Dividend Stock to Buy for Passive Income in June
summary: Verizon has a dividend yield of more than 6%, triple the average Dow stock.  The telecom company produces lots of cash to cover its dividend and invest in growing its business.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average tracks 30 large, publicly traded blue chip stocks.
